title: exercise of jurisdiction
extract: Power or right of a legal or political agency to exercise its authority over a person, subject matter, or territory. Jurisdiction over a person relates to the authority to try him or her as a defendant. ... Jurisdiction over a territory relates to the geographic area over which a court has the authority to decide cases.
extract_html: Power or right of a legal or political agency to exercise its authority over a person, subject matter, or territory. Jurisdiction over a person relates to the authority to try him or her as a defendant. ... Jurisdiction over a territory relates to the geographic area over which a court has the authority to decide cases.
